description: Whenever Baronessa di Rivera and Miss Emelie travel through the forests of Brandenburg, they make sure their divine feet don't get worn out. Three of their slaves have the distinct honor of driving the handcar with their Mistresses inside. These ungrateful creatures use a rest stop as an opportunity to escape, but just find themselves bound to trees just a few minutes later. This causes the Mistresses to give their asses a nice whipping. Then they literally get used as pigs...
title: Sperm Pigs
